DOC.brief_summary: The objective clinical investigation ass safety clinical performance Orsiro Limus Eluting Stent System Indian subject single de-novo coronary artery lesion .
DOC.brief_title: BIOFLOW-INDIA Safety Clinical PerFormance Drug Eluting ORSIRO Stent Single de Novo Coronary Artery Lesions
DOC.criteria: Main Subject provide write informed consent Single de novo lesion ≥ 50 % < 100 % stenosis 2 coronary artery The target lesion length ≤ 26 mm The target reference vessel diameter ≥ 2.0 mm ≤ 4.0 mm Main Evidence myocardial infarction within 72 hour prior index procedure Unprotected leave main coronary artery disease ( stenosis > 50 % ) Threevessel coronary artery disease time procedure Thrombus target vessel Target lesion involve side branch > 2.0 mm diameter Heavily calcify lesion Target lesion locate supplied arterial venous bypass graft
